consensus.full_summary: Top comments overwhelmingly condemn the video as disrespectful/inauthentic to Carlin’s voice and craft. Community refs are mostly news/legal links calling out the release and lawsuit, not technical citations — refs present but external-media–driven. Example: The Guardian + Newsweek + The Hollywood Reporter.
